summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2677, for the improvement of Terry Avenue, from Virginia Street to the northerly margin of Lenora Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon together with necessary wooden crosswalks, under Ordinance No. 31536 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
